total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern of 4s in the input grid.
Q2: Determine the transformation rule from the input grid to the output grid in the examples.

Q5: Apply the pattern of 4s from the input grid to the transformed grid.
Q6: Generate the output grid by applying the transformation rule to the positions of 4s in the transformed grid.
